item.description:
Join us for a night of socializing and dancing. Practice speaking Portuguese and/or practice your dance steps.

 

Brazilian forró dance class: 9pm to 10pm $10 cash (drop in)
Live Brazilian Band: 10:30pm

 

Parking is available to the left of the building as well as in the back. Street parking is also available.

When you enter, take a right into the bar/club area to find us.

 

If you arrive after the class starts, look for us on the dance floor.  There is no obligation to take the class although it does help if you are looking to dance.

 

Brazilian food and cocktails are available on the premises.

 

Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Depending on the number of people attending, I will post info on where we will be sitting soon.

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Social: dancing and Portuguese conversation
